item.title: MIUI OS2.0.101.0.VMAMIXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 13 Ultra Global
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13 Ultra Global

Codename: ishtar

Version: OS2.0.101.0.VMAMIXM | 15.0

Size: 6.4 GB

MD5: 7be47ad8909fd9807d836208c2cf7a72

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Control center]
New: Flashlight brightness adjustment page
New: Certain devices now support adjustable flashlight brightness
New: Notification spotlight for flashlight
[Privacy protection]
Optimization: Permissions icons in the status bar flickered
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.108.0.VMACNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 13 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13 Ultra China

Codename: ishtar

Version: OS2.0.108.0.VMACNXM | 15.0

Size: 7.2 GB

MD5: 2c25a16f2254787f88866fc71b1e3ed5

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
[Home screen]
Removed the option for swiping up on the Home screen to open search
[Camera]
New: Quick snap parameter presets
New: Pro mode parameter presets for photos
New: Style presets for Pro mode
Optimization: Zoom format for video recording

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
